name: A Dragon’s Tale - Rise Of The Dragon’s Mother On Her Quest To Save The Dragon Babies
name_original: A Dragon’s Tale - Rise Of The Dragon’s Mother On Her Quest To Save The Dragon Babies
description:
Match 3 with a twist! Join the Dragon and his mother on their quest to save the dragon baby eggs. But be careful you don't save the wrong eggs!

Features:
Three levels of play including Classic, Dragon's Party, Eliminator and
Different difficulty levels
Combo bonuses
And lots of fun!
